The Disneyland National Wonder decreases [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in non-occupied cities. It also increases [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in the empire by 12 and provides +3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. A civilization must have an Amusement Park in all cities before it can construct Disneyland.

Disneyland, "The Happiest Place on Earth", is the first of two amusement parks built at the Disneyland Resort in Anaheim, California, opened on July 17, 1955. Spanning 160 acres and the only amusement park to be designed and built under the direct supervision of Walt Disney, it is dedicated to fairy tales and Disney characters. Disneyland has a larger cumulative attendance than any other amusement park in the world, hosting approximately 600 million guests since its opening. In 2011, the park hosted approximately 16.14 million guests, making it the second most visited park in the world that calendar year. The park is represented by Sleeping Beauty Castle, a replica of the fairy tale castle seen in the 1959 film.
